Teltoli / Kit
------------

"Yeal well.. I might become Neutral.. it'd be a good idea, I guess"

Teltoli looks back to see Dracona staring into the bush. She sees the tip of a tail and thinks she knows who it is. The Fuzor smiles and says to Dracona.

"It's nothing, just your imagination" She said, silently hoping Dracona didn't press the matter.

-----

Kit frowns, she hadn't expected that. More so, she didn't even know where the Maximal Base was!

"Yes.. THE Ark. You know.. the big one.. with the [retty lights, and.. and .. yeah" She says lamely. "Okay, I'll take ye to the Maximal Base, Pegasus.. follow me"

Kit turns and points North. "That way!" She announces, and heads off, hoping Pegasus will follow her..
